snippet.title: Simulacrum: Chapter One - Trailer
snippet.description:
Now available (pay-what-you-want or free): https://gamejolt.com/games/simulacrum_chapter_one/233384
---
Warning, contains flashing images!

Trapped in a dark and dismal world, Abigail must find her way back home by solving riddles to escape a hellish nightmare and discover the roots of her past.

An adventure game designed and developed by Andrew Carr and Christopher A. Summer.

---
You can keep up to date with the progress of Simulacrum at the links below:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/simulacrumgame
Twitter: https://twitter.com/SimulacrumGame
GameJolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/simulacrum-chapter-one/233384
